2. Wide angle lens: A wide-angle lens (12-35mm) or even wider will help you capture more of the scene and create a more immersive experience.
3. Image stabilization: This feature reduces camera shake and blur, ensuring clear photos even when you're not on a tripod.
4. RAW image capture: This feature allows you to edit and enhance your photos later, giving you greater creative control.

9. RAW image editing software: This feature will allow you to edit and enhance your photos directly from the camera, without needing to transfer them to a computer.
